name: Sylvie In The Rain
description:
It's a cold, rainy day and a ghost just invited you to sit and have a drink. Sometimes it's nice to sit next to a warm fire, with someone to listen to your troubles.

A short visual novel, 3k words and just one ending.

Warning for some depressed thoughts from the PoV character. This game is about talking about your issues, and the value of having a friend who listens.

My first ever game, made for the Cozy Autumn jam :D
